name: K438-B_DEMO
description:
Gamepads supported !! 

Go to options to configure the gamepad's buttons or the keyboard keys.

If the D-PAD isn't detected, put Gamepad Axis ON and retry.

This is a demo version. The game isn't finished but feel free to rate it and leave comments.

----------------------------------------------

A new planet has been discovered

K438-B is a low gravity exo planet

Your mission

Find information about living organisms

Kill any potential threats

Good luck!!

----------------------------------------------

Collectable Power Up on the Demo version:

  • weapons: beam, machine gun
  • ball suit, ball suit sonar
  • 4 energy packs

Collectable Power Up on the Final version:

  • weapons: beam, machine gun, missiles, flame thrower, laser
  • wall jump
  • ball suit, ball suit bomb, ball suit jump, ball suit sonar
  • jump booster suit
  • speed booster suit
  • cling suit
  • dash, dash-shield
  • 9 energy packs

----------------------------------------------

Default controls (on azerty keyboard) Go to options menu to configure keys as you like:

  • direction: cursors
  • fire: x
  • jump: w
  • run: c
  • select weapon: s
  • pause: p

----------------------------------------------

Good game !!
